name: Neverwinter Nights
notes: Ignore runtime error during installation, game installed successfully and playable.

files.setup: N/A:Please select the installer for this game

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Please select the installer for this game
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/NWN Diamond/nwn.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- move:
    dst: $CACHE/setup_nwn_diamond_2.1.0.21.exe.xml
    src: gog_file_0
- move:
    dst: $CACHE/setup_nwn_diamond_2.1.0.21.exe
    src: gog_file_1
- move:
    dst: $CACHE/setup_nwn_diamond_2.1.0.21-1.bin.xml
    src: gog_file_2
- move:
    dst: $CACHE/setup_nwn_diamond_2.1.0.21-1.bin
    src: gog_file_3
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: null
    description: Installing
    executable: $CACHE/setup_nwn_diamond_2.1.0.21.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
